title: Constant issue ... smh
body: Every time league updates ie. large patch or small tweaks... My game will not launch , like i can open it click on the launch button and nothing happens ... the client and patcher are running i can see it running under processes but nothing happens ... ive literally tried every fix posted the only thing that has worked is i have to fully uninstall every thing league related ... a full wipe on my computer and then sit through a full re install ... it works until the next update of any kind ... seriously so annoyed and i need help

replies.body:
I think what *Ventura* mentioned is really helpful for a lot of issues prior to reaching in-game and is likely to help in your situation in particular. Additionally, this may be caused by other settings in your network configuration, so working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) may also help here.

Let me know if you still have issues with this.

I've gotten this before! Let me see if this helps for you.

First, use Task Manager to manually close the LoL patcher.

Try going to this path (if you didn't download LoL in the default folders):

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Try running the lol.launcher.admin client, see if that opens up.
Drivers are there to cause some problems or just start as admin sometimes also helps and ofc be patient it is not as fast as a rocket <.<
